description: The BlackYak Nelore Jacket is made using Cordura® lightweight Ripstop and Cordua® Fleece. This jacket has been filled using 700 fill power of traceable goose down that has been treated to be water repellent. The jacket has a great range of use as it is lightweight and has a very small packing volume. Designed to be worn as a layer underneath your 3L Jacket or on its own, the innovative design and colors make the Nelore Jacket a real statement.
name: Black Yak Nelore Jacket - Mens
